item.title: Build your blog with GitHub Pages for FREE
item.description: I tried multiple times to create a blog and publish things constantly but I failed each time. I usually started with a lot of enthusiasm but the tools used to create and publish content, always were boring and tedious for me to don’t say complex. I tried WordPress because everyone says it’s the best CMS but It’s overwhelming the number of pluggings, configurations, deployment, and so on, it’s overkill for a simple blog like this one.
